sentence.Network_en: The company voted to enfranchise its 120 women members.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司投票决定给予其120名女职员选举权。

it is you enfranchised men . it is the Bernard Shaws and all the rest of them . ( cheers and laughter . ) They say the science of government is only suited to the male sex .就怪那些有公民权的人，就该怪萧伯纳之流，(叫好，笑声)他们声称政治管理只适合男性。

it is you enfranchised men . it is the Bernard Shaws and all the rest of them . ( cheers and laughter . ) They say the science of government is only suited to the male sex .就怪那些有公民权的人，就该怪萧伯纳之流，(叫好，笑声)他们声称政治管理只适合男性。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (formerly also as infranchise): from Old French enfranchiss-, lengthened stem of enfranchir, from en- (expressing a change of state) + franc, franche 'free'

entry.def: To enfranchise someone means to give them the right to vote in elections.

example.ex: The company voted to enfranchise its 120 women members...
example.tran: 公司投票决定给予其120名女职员选举权。

example.ex: If the city's foreign residents are enfranchised, they won't be able to vote until 1996.
example.tran: 如果该市的外国居民获得选举权，他们要到1996年才能投票。

means.word_mean: 1. grant freedom to; as from slavery or servitude;

sentences.sentence: "Slaves were enfranchised in the mid-19th century"

auth_sentence.content: For a third time, the House votes to enfranchise women.
auth_sentence.res_content: For a third time, the House votes to enfranchise women.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For a third time, the House votes to enfranchise women.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+dem人民+ic表形容词→在人民之中→地方性的
en进入……之中,包围,成为+cage笼子→v.关入笼中
en进入……之中,包围,成为+chain锁链→v.束缚
en进入……之中,包围,成为+roll转,倦→往里倦→注册

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+title标题,头衔→v. 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
en进入……之中,包围,成为+trap陷阱→v.以网或陷阱捕捉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+purple紫→v.使成紫色 v.发紫
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+act行动→进入行动→颁布[法令]
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+chant反复说;咒语→被咒语所迷醉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+courage勇气→使人进入勇气→鼓励
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+danger危险→v.使危险
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+franchise特权,公民权→给予选举权

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使忙碌, 雇佣, 预定
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+gage挑战→进入挑战→忙碌于……
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+large大→v.扩大, 放大
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+light光+en变成→给人光明→启发
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+list名单→进入名单→入伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+rich富的→v.使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+wrap包裹→v.包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
